org.arl.fjage

Interface Messenger

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Agent, Gateway, ShellAgent

    public interface Messenger
    Interface implemented by classes that provide basic messaging services.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Message receive()
      Returns a message received by the gateway.
      Message receive(java.lang.Class<?> cls)
      Returns a message of a given class received by the gateway.
      Message receive(java.lang.Class<?> cls, long timeout)
      Returns a message of a given class received by the gateway.
      Message receive(long timeout)
      Returns a message received by the agent.
      Message receive(Message m)
      Returns a response message received by the gateway.
      Message receive(MessageFilter filter)
      Returns a message received by the gateway and matching the given filter.
      Message receive(MessageFilter filter, long timeout)
      Returns a message received by the gateway and matching the given filter.
      Message receive(Message m, long timeout)
      Returns a response message received by the gateway.
      Message request(Message msg)
      Sends a request and waits for a response.
      Message request(Message msg, long timeout)
      Sends a request and waits for a response.
      boolean send(Message m)
      Sends a message to the recipient indicated in the message.

    • Method Detail

      • send

        boolean send(Message m)
        Sends a message to the recipient indicated in the message. The recipient may be either an agent or a topic.
        Parameters:
        m - message to be sent.
        Returns:
        true if message accepted for delivery, false on failure.

      • receive

        Message receive()
        Returns a message received by the gateway. This method is non-blocking.
        Returns:
        received message, null if none available.

      • receive

        Message receive(long timeout)
        Returns a message received by the agent. This method blocks until timeout if no message available.
        Parameters:
        timeout - timeout in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        received message, null on timeout.

      • receive

        Message receive(java.lang.Class<?> cls)
        Returns a message of a given class received by the gateway. This method is non-blocking.
        Parameters:
        cls - the class of the message of interest.
        Returns:
        received message of the given class, null if none available.

      • receive

        Message receive(java.lang.Class<?> cls,
                long timeout)
        Returns a message of a given class received by the gateway. This method blocks until timeout if no message available.
        Parameters:
        cls - the class of the message of interest.
        timeout - timeout in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        received message of the given class, null on timeout.

      • receive

        Message receive(Message m)
        Returns a response message received by the gateway. This method is non-blocking.
        Parameters:
        m - original message to which a response is expected.
        Returns:
        received response message, null if none available.

      • receive

        Message receive(Message m,
                long timeout)
        Returns a response message received by the gateway. This method blocks until timeout if no message available.
        Parameters:
        m - original message to which a response is expected.
        timeout - timeout in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        received response message, null on timeout.

      • receive

        Message receive(MessageFilter filter)
        Returns a message received by the gateway and matching the given filter. This method is non-blocking.
        Parameters:
        filter - message filter.
        Returns:
        received message matching the filter, null on timeout.

      • receive

        Message receive(MessageFilter filter,
                long timeout)
        Returns a message received by the gateway and matching the given filter. This method blocks until timeout if no message available.
        Parameters:
        filter - message filter.
        timeout - timeout in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        received message matching the filter, null on timeout.

      • request

        Message request(Message msg,
                long timeout)
        Sends a request and waits for a response. This method blocks until timeout if no response is received.
        Parameters:
        msg - message to send.
        timeout - timeout in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        received response message, null on timeout.

      • request

        Message request(Message msg)
        Sends a request and waits for a response. This method blocks until a default timeout, if no response is received.
        Parameters:
        msg - message to send.
        Returns:
        received response message, null on timeout.
